description: Contributor guides, templates, and access controls for new contributors (human and agent)

steps.title: Create CONTRIBUTING.md guide
steps.description:
Document how to contribute to the project.

## Sections
- [ ] Development setup (bun install, etc)
- [ ] Running tests
- [ ] Code style (biome)
- [ ] PR process
- [ ] Commit message format
- [ ] Branch naming convention
- [ ] Issue reporting guidelines

steps.title: Add GitHub issue and PR templates
steps.description:
Create templates for consistent issue/PR formatting.

## Templates
- [ ] .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md
- [ ] .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md
- [ ] .github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md

## Include
- Bug: steps to reproduce, expected/actual behavior
- Feature: use case, proposed solution
- PR: description, testing done, checklist
